column5: Anyone know if the salmon are in the rivers yet?  TIA!
Put in the leg work!  They're in there... not a lot of them... but they're in there.
didn't you ask same question about bronte few days ago smartypants ?
Yeah I know  That's why I answered his question
was told that the lower end is good but upper parts some not much i will find out this weekend for myself
I'm gonna be heading out there FRIDAY and probably a bit of SATURDAY MORNING if anyone wants to hookup!
the salmon are there, earplugs are the go to bait
ear plugs???  what happend to roe and marshmellows I thought that was allways the go to bait when the chinies are in
I like the colourful marshmellows, they work better then the plain white ones   .   Rich.
you put bait on your  hook for salmon????? hmmmm
